data.title: A woolly mammoth meatball? Scientists grew prehistoric meat with extinct animal DNA
data.description: A cell-based meat company resurrected the extinct woolly mammoth in the form of a lab-grown meatball.

data.title: People with diabetes lived longer on lower carb and plant-based diet, study finds
data.description: Moderating carbohydrates and avoiding processed food and meats appears to lower the risk of cardiovascular disease and cancer, a Harvard study finds.
data.snippet:
